com.knowgate.hipermail

Class DBStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.mail.Service
      • javax.mail.Store
        • com.knowgate.hipermail.DBStore

  • public class DBStore
extends javax.mail.Store
    Manages local storage of mail messages at RDBMS and MBOX files
    Version:
    7.0
